about_the_game:
Don't want to grind? Get all [event] decorations for a slight bargain with this DLC!

Included Items:
  • Love Mom Neon
  • I Love Mom Poster
  • Orchid Plant
  • Table Tulips
  • Flower Pot
  • Momma Duck
  • Vintage (Wall)
  • Pizza My Heart Box

**PLEASE NOTE:
If you already own any item from the list, purchasing this DLC will not provide you an extra set/ duplicate nor be discounted off of the final price. You will only receive the items you have yet to obtain.
